sentences.english: Even my preferred product is currently out-of-stock , I am still loyal to the website.
sentences.chinese: 即使我喜爱的商品暂时缺货，我仍然会忠诚于此网站。

sentences.english: But the 32-inch model we'd like to buy was temporarily out of stock. We had to wait.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们想买的32吋机种暂时缺货，所以得等一等。

sentences.english: The store is shy on porcelain cups.
I’m sorry, it is out of stock for the time being.
The use case ends once the user confirms that the unavailable items have been resolved.
sentences.chinese: 一旦用户确认缺货物品的问题已解决，则此用例结束。

sentences.english: How often do you facing the stock-out problem when you purchase fast fashion?
sentences.chinese: 当你购买快速时装时，是否经常遇到缺货的情况吗？

sentences.english: That model is out of stock now.
I'm not sure, if you can not find them on the rack, they might be out of stock.
sentences.chinese: 我不确定，如果你在货架上找不到，那可能缺货了。

sentences.english: We haven't any amplifiers in stock just at present; but they should come in any moment.
sentences.chinese: 目前，扩音机我们正好缺货，不过随时可能有货供应。

sentences.english: She likes to eat "cute" many ", so in freezer never out of stock.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢吃“可爱多”，所以冰箱中从未缺货。

sentences.english: An order must have been identified for which one or more items are unavailable.
sentences.chinese: 订单必须已经标识了一个或多个物品缺货。

sentences.english: I'd say typical white man uses rubber.
sentences.chinese: 白种男人用的橡胶套，中央帝国缺货。

sentences.english: A rumor of a shortage stampeded people into laying in supplies.
sentences.chinese: 缺货的谢意驱使人们囤积生活用品。

sentences.english: One of these is the unavailability of items in the storehouse.
sentences.chinese: 其中之一是仓库中物品缺货。

definition: merchandise or commodities available immediately after sale/merchandise in stock/available item/actuals (investment)/actual commodities
property or cash held in reserve/stock
to sell out/to run out (of supplies)/deficient/lack of supplies
to cut the price/to drive down the price/to get cheaper
to appreciate (in value)/to increase in price
to buy frenetically/to snap up (bargains, dwindling supplies etc)
